hero.title: ¿Qué es SDOH?
hero.subtitle: (Or in plain terms: What the Heck is Social Determinants of Health?)
hero.location: VelocityTX, 1422 E Houston St, San Antonio, TX 78205

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Join us for a panel discussion on Social Determinants of Health (SDOH) during RGV Startup Week. Learn how local leaders, innovators, and entrepreneurs can turn awareness into action.
mission.codeComment: // Join us for this innovative panel
mission.description1: This panel brings together healthcare innovators, entrepreneurs, and community leaders to discuss how we can address SDOH in the Rio Grande Valley.
mission.description2: We'll explore how technology, community engagement, and cross-sector collaboration can create sustainable solutions to improve health outcomes for all residents.

newsletter.title: Stay Updated
newsletter.description: Sign up for our newsletter to receive updates about the event and future SDOH initiatives.
newsletter.error: An error occurred. Please try again.

bootcamp.title: Startup Bootcamp
bootcamp.subtitle: Early-Stage Program
bootcamp.description: A hands-on, early-stage program that helps local entrepreneurs turn ideas into action. Participants receive guidance on business models, impact measurement, funding strategies, and how to build solutions that address real community needs.

accelerator.title: Community Health Accelerator
accelerator.subtitle: Growth-Stage Program
accelerator.description1: For startups ready to scale, this accelerator provides deeper support—from mentoring and expert workshops to connections with healthcare systems, investors, and ecosystem partners focused on sustainable health innovation.
accelerator.description2: This program exists to answer big questions in a practical way—and to make sure the people closest to the issues have the tools, resources, and support to solve them.

demoDay.title: Demo Day Highlights
demoDay.description: Watch how our accelerator cohort companies are transforming healthcare through innovation.

impact.question: What can I do to make a difference?

sdoh.title: ¿Qué es SDOH?
sdoh.subtitle: (Or in plain terms: What the Heck is Social Determinants of Health?)
sdoh.intro1: Most of what affects our health doesn't happen in a hospital—it happens in our everyday lives. Where we live, what we eat, how we get to work or school, whether we feel safe, supported, and seen... these things shape our health long before a doctor ever gets involved.
sdoh.intro2Part2: are: the real-world conditions that impact how long—and how well—we live.

partnership.label: STRATEGIC PARTNERSHIP
partnership.title: Powered by VelocityTX & Methodist Healthcare Ministries
partnership.description: In partnership with VelocityTX and Methodist Healthcare Ministries, the Community Health Accelerator program connects education, entrepreneurship, and innovation through three core components.

seminar.title: Seminar + Speaker Series
seminar.description1: is a program designed to break down this big, often misunderstood topic into everyday language—and show how local leaders, innovators, and entrepreneurs can turn awareness into action.
seminar.description2: We believe that by understanding the root causes of health outcomes
seminar.description2End: —we can inspire more people to build the future of health right here in our communities.
seminar.highlight: The series features live events and panels designed to spark conversation, raise awareness, and make complex health topics feel approachable and relevant—especially for aspiring founders, healthcare workers, educators, and community changemakers.

sessions.comingSoonDescription: This video will be available after the event. Check back later to watch the full session.

card1.title: Market Analysis and Value Delivery
card1.description: Understanding Needs and Quality Solutions presented by Shireen Abdullah, Founder, Yumlish, 2024 MHM Accelerator Cohort Champion

card2.title: Legal Considerations for Raising Capital
card2.description: Understanding the Process presented by Jose Padilla, Founder, Padilla Law, LLC and LegalmenteAI

card3.title: The Perfect Pitch
card3.description: Captivating Investors and Closing Deals presented by Luis Martinez, PhD, Sr. Venture Assoc., Capital Factory
